nodes.title: Raw Text Input
widgets_values:
A rain-slicked urban street in a dense metropolis at midnight...
A close-up, high-angle shot...
An expansive, wide-angle landscape...

widgets_values.120: A close-up, high-angle shot of a minimalist luxury apartment balcony overlooking a blurred city. A single white T-shirt is draped over a modern chair, catching the blue glow of distant city lights. An open window lets in a soft, hazy mist that mimics the lingering scent of perfume. The lighting is a blend of cool exterior blue and a warm, dim interior glow. Focus on textures of fabric, glass, and the distant bokeh of traffic.
widgets_values.240: An expansive, wide-angle landscape of the city skyline during the blue hour just before sunrise. A light morning frost and a cool, crisp fog roll over the skyscrapers as the seasons change. The vibrant neons have dimmed, leaving a monochromatic blue palette. The sky is a vast gradient of deep navy to pale grey. The scene is quiet, empty, and bittersweet. Photorealistic, cinematic wide shot, serene and cold.
